primaryPhoto.description:
Come and see ‘the ultimate feel-good show’ (Classic FM) at the Novello Theatre with MAMMA MIA! – the world’s sunniest, most exhilarating smash-hit musical!
Fall in love with the irresistibly funny tale of a mother, a daughter, and three possible dads on a Greek island idyll, all unfolding to the magic of ABBA’s timeless songs in this fantastic jukebox musical.
Since premiering in London’s West End in 1999, Judy Cramer’s vision of bringing the sparkle of ABBA’s songs to the stage has thrilled over 70 million people around the world, in over 50 different productions and 16 languages!
The worldwide phenomenon has led to the release of two record-breaking movies – MAMMA MIA! The Movie and MAMMA MIA! Here We Go Again. The movie cast included Meryl Streep, Colin Firth, and Pierce Brosnan singing some of ABBA‘s most popular songs of all time.
Whatever age you are, you can’t help but have the time of your life at MAMMA MIA!
Book your MAMMA MIA! theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
